               throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
Create a MovingPlatform object

Parameters:
location - The starting location of the object
world - The world in which to create the body
spos - The location of one end of the track
fpos - The location of the second end of the track
type - The type of platform (small/large)
continuousMovement - Whether the platform should keep moving (loop)
Throws:
org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
